channel.title: How do i add gfx for dragons?
channel.description:
I want to make it so dragons when theyre fighting som1 they breath fire! I already have the gfx number for it but i do not know how to add it. I also want it to randomly breath fire and attack just like in runescape and some servers!
PLZ help!
